mapper.insert:
select reply_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reply (root_id, reply_id, reply_person, reply_date, reply_content) values (${Reply.root_id}, ${Reply.reply_id}, #{Reply.reply_title}, to_date(#{Reply.reply_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{Reply.reply_content})
mapper.select: select * from reply where root_id=${Reply.root_id} order by reply_id
mapper.update: update reply set reply_person = ${Reply.reply_person}, reply_date = to_date(#{Reply.reply_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), reply_content = #{Reply.reply_content} where reply_id = ${Reply.reply_id}
